description: This file defines two asynchronous functions 'get' and 'update' for handling HTTP requests related to information retrieval and updating, interacting with a model module '../models/info.js'.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve info data by calling Info.getInfo and responding with the data as JSON.

methods.name: update(req, res, next)
methods.description: Handles update requests to modify info data by calling Info.setInfo with request body and responding with the updated data as JSON.
